column4: I don't know how to get my sound to work with ubuntu, it's an onboard 'Rockwell' sound 'card' on an older HP Pavilion PC..?? It says the sound card is not configured...etc.
right, you're pretty much out of luck. You'll need to use a different sound card.
alternately, you can check if www.opensound.com has support for it.
keep in mind that it is different from alsa (what Ubuntu uses by default).
